alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 10 at 2:29PM MDT until September 10 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NATRONA COUNTY... At 229 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Midwest, which is also 23 miles southeast of Kaycee, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Teapot Rock. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 213 and 229. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
